Name: Haunted Manor: Queen of Death Collector's Edition
About the game: Dive into Haunted Manor: Queen of Death and save your sister before it’s too late! Find a powerful amulet to stop an ancient evil in this amazing Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. After receiving a mysterious letter, you return home to find that your family has been murdered. The only survivor is your sister, Stella, who now needs you to save her! Concoct a powerful elixir to save Stella and then confront the Queen of Death! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes: Bonus gameplay Integrated Strategy Guide Wonderful Wallpapers
